      • relativeRight

        public static org.bukkit.block.BlockFace relativeRight(org.bukkit.block.BlockFace blockFace)
        Now we have to set up directions for when the cart turns to the right. Also to determine what direction the cart is facing when it was built and when it get's registered again to determine what is "relative". This is to determine what would be considered "right".
        Parameters:
        blockFace -
        Returns:
        direction

        public static org.bukkit.block.BlockFace isCart(org.bukkit.entity.LivingEntity h)
